name: NanTiOx
description: Nantiox, Inc. is a small organization in the commercial physical research companies industry located in Edmond, OK.

name: nSolgel
description: Turning sand into coastal defence barriers, with a new generation of high-strength, rapid-setting, low-carbon, cement-like construction materials.

name: NanoCe
description: Aims to commercialize nanoceria (NC) for biomedical applications. NC has shown promise in aiding the prevention of blindness.
